page.title: 10FOOTPATHS IN EPPING GREEN
page.content: THE AREA THAT LIES BETWEEN EPPING GREEN,BUMBLES GREEN AND NAZEING TO THE NORTH IS WELL SERVED BY FOOTPATHS.THE MAIN PATH THAT RUNS FROM JUST OUTSIDE THE "TRAVELLERS REST" AT EPPING GREEN APPOXIMATELY SOUTH WEST,HAS BEEN DESIGNATED AS SUITABLE FOR HANDICAPPED PEOPLE. KNOWN AS "FOREST WAY",THE PATH IS WELL USED BY LOCAL PEOPLE AND VISITING RAMBLERS. ABOVE BUMBLES GREEN SEVERAL TREES HAVE BEEN PLANTED BY Mr. AND Mrs.MACKIE TO MARK THE PLEASURE HAD BY THEM FROM WALKING IN THE AREA. A SMALL COMMEMORATIVE PLAQUE MARKS THEIR GIFT. VIRTUALLY THE WHOLE AREA IS ACCESSIBLE BY FOOTPATH,AND THE COUNTRYSIDE COMMISSION HAS DONE A SPLENDID IN CLEARLY SIGNPOSTING ALL THE PATHS.THE WALKING IS EASY,ENTERTAININGAND ANYONE WHO IS HEALTHY CAN HAVE A GOOD TIME WALKING IN THIS BEAUTIFUL AREA.
